sql-select.name: GetInstanceProcessesByLoginMonth
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month') AS [EventDayMin] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month','+1 month','-1 day') AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceProcessesByLogin] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceProcessesByLogin] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceProcessesByLoginDays
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,CASE WHEN (strftime('%w', t.[EventDay]) = '0') THEN '#CC0000' ELSE '#080808' END AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMin] ,MAX(t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceProcessesByLogin] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceProcessesByLogin
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT hIPBL.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,hSILN.[LogiName] AS [LogiName] ,CASE WHEN (hIPBL.[Cpu] > hIPBL.[CpuLast]) THEN CAST((hIPBL.[Cpu] - hIPBL.[CpuLast]) AS [REAL]) / CAST((strftime('%s', hIPBL.[EventTime]) - strftime('%s', hIPBL.[EventTimeLast])) AS [REAL]) ELSE 0.0 END AS [Cpu] ,CASE WHEN (hIPBL.[PhysicalIO] > hIPBL.[PhysicalIOLast]) THEN CAST((hIPBL.[PhysicalIO] - hIPBL.[PhysicalIOLast]) AS [REAL]) / CAST((strftime('%s', hIPBL.[EventTime]) - strftime('%s', hIPBL.[EventTimeLast])) AS [REAL]) ELSE 0.0 END AS [PhysicalIO] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceProcessesByLogin] hIPBL INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hIPBL.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceLogiName] hSILN ON hSILN.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIPBL.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSILN.[h_LogiName_id] = hIPBL.[h_LogiName_id] WHERE length(ifnull(hSILN.[LogiName], '')) > 0 AND hIPBL.[EventTimeLast] IS NOT NULL AND hIPBL.[EventTime] > hIPBL.[EventTimeLast] AND ( hIPBL.[Cpu] <> hIPBL.[CpuLast] OR hIPBL.[PhysicalIO] <> hIPBL.[PhysicalIOLast] ) AND CASE WHEN ((@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) AND (@EventDayMax IS NOT NULL)) THEN hIPBL.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) WHEN (@strDateTimeModifier IS NOT NULL) THEN hIPBL.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(hIPBL.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceProcessesByLogin] hIPBL INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hIPBL.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceLogiName] hSILN ON hSILN.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hIPBL.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSILN.[h_LogiName_id] = hIPBL.[h_LogiName_id] ) ELSE hIPBL.[EventDay] = date('1900-01-01') END ORDER BY hIPBL.[EventTime] ASC ;
